content: I think I'll try out the Creamy Chicken Tortilla Soup recipe this weekend. I'm excited to see how it compares to my coworker's version. By the way, I'm really looking forward to making the Korean-Style BBQ Beef Tacos tonight. The combination of the spicy kimchi slaw and the sweet and savory beef sounds amazing. I'll be sure to let you know how it turns out! Also, I wanted to mention that I recently cooked a chicken fajita dinner for myself and my roommate last weekend, and it turned out pretty well. I used a new recipe I found on Pinterest, and the key was marinating the chicken in lime juice and cumin for a few hours beforehand.
